meanings.sent1: The doctor injected the inoculums to protect the child from getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory prepared different inoculums to test their effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey accidentally spilled the inoculums all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as an inoculums against negativity, spreading hope and positivity.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the inoculums made it easy to spot in the lab.
